description:
Haiku Deck is a free web based tool that allows you to easily create persuasive and powerful presentations.

With Haiku Deck, you now have a fresh alternative to dull PowerPoint slides or confusing Prezi presentations. Haiku Deck allows you to simply transfer your PowerPoint content into the Haiku Deck editor, freshen it up, and then export it back into a PowerPoint file so you can use it just like before, hassle free - but now it will be ten times cooler!

By the time you complete this course, you will be creating powerful and visually engaging presentations.

Along the way, you will learn how to:

  • get started with Haiku Deck, learn the essentials and create your first presentation
  • add and edit text, backgrounds, charts, slides and layouts, formatting them to create visually powerful slideshows
  • use themes to further enhance your slides and add notes to enrich your presentations

The course instructor, Will Thomas, is available on hand to offer advice, answer questions, and provide 1:1 coaching should you need it.
title: Create Engaging & Dynamic Presentations with Haiku Deck
